document_title: Elbow pain: Causes, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Elbow pain or elbow pain is a symptom of a disorder that affects the function, activity and structure of the elbow joint. The disease occurs when one or more parts that make up the elbow become inflamed or excessively irritated. Patients will have red, swollen and painful joints, with limited range of motion. In many cases, there can be joint deformity and stiffness of the elbow joint, causing difficulty in daily activities and work. (first)
subsection_title: dau khop khuyu tay.json. What is elbow pain?

dau khop khuyu tay.json. What is elbow pain?
Elbow pain or elbow pain is a symptom of a disorder that affects the function, activity and structure of the elbow joint. The disease occurs when one or more parts that make up the elbow become inflamed or excessively irritated. Patients will have red, swollen and painful joints, with limited range of motion. In many cases, there can be joint deformity and stiffness of the elbow joint, causing difficulty in daily activities and work. (first)
